tool_description: NFT Rarity And Score Calculator: Instantly calculate scores for each asset of yours or others collections.
name: NFT Rarity calculator
title: NFT Rarity calculator

api_list.name: Calculate scores from metadata URL
api_list.description: The metadata.json should be presented as combined files of metadata.

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description: Provide the full source path of the metadata.json file

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Use the `limit` parameter, to get a limited result or skip it to get full data.
